attributes.action: Allow animals to have the rights they deserve after brexit!
attributes.additional_details: Animals can feel pain, hunger, distress, cold, warm, thirst. I don’t understand how the Tory party have came up wth the decision that they can’t.. I would love to see where your  there facts came from to declare that animals don’t have rights!
attributes.background: Animals deserve the same rights as humans! Giving the latest debating with the Tory party stating that animals can’t feel pain, hunger and that the animal welfare act 2006 won’t be brought over after brexit. They deserve their own rights.
